Text:
Entertaining, but perhaps a bit too much tin foil hat syndrome mixed with belief in magic & stuff. 

Like y2k, not long to see that this (2012) will also pass without much ado :)

The video was a bit borked on aspect ratio, but was still quite watchable.


Thanks!

To see 2012 as y2k is a little naive IMO, i think there are a bit more history about 2012 than 2000.
But will anything happen? We just have to wait and see don't we =)
